answers.answer: I've never been a big water drinker, but I can't get enough water now!
Me too. Its water, tea, lemonade, apple juice. I sucked down 3 of my sons capri suns this morning while i was getting ready for work.
Me too!!! I drank so much water yesterday its like I was dehydrated but I was just thirsty!  I kept drinking until I went to bed and now starting again today!
I have been so thirsty it's like I have a bottomless water spring somewhere
Meeee toooo !!!! It's out of control
Girl get your sugars checked!! It might have something to do with the increased thirst
You should get glucose levels checked just to be safe a sign of gestational diabetes is extreme thirst.
Oh no! I had gestational diabetes with my son....i really hope i dont have it this time!!!

question: I cannot get enough to drink! Whats with this!!?!?! I havent had much of an appetite,but some days i can eat everything in site. Today i feel so so thirsty!
title: soooo thirsty!
